r.d: Support for JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) serialization. This is a drop-in alternative to PHP standard json extension.
r.n: - number must not have leading zeroes (json-c pr #90, merged) - string must be double-quoted (json-c PR #94) - comment are not allowed (json-c PR #94) - trailing char after data not allowed (json-c PR #94) - add JSON_C_BUNDLED and JSON_C_VERSION constants
